title: CookbookPage recipe card thumbnails have empty alt text
description:
In ramekin-ui/src/pages/CookbookPage.tsx line 679, the PhotoThumbnail component is passed alt="" for recipe card images. These are meaningful content images (not decorative), so the alt text should be the recipe title.

Fix: Change alt="" to alt={recipe.title} on the PhotoThumbnail in the recipe grid.
